channel.title: "player cannot be resolved" help with deathtouched darts

item.title: "player cannot be resolved" help with deathtouched darts
item.dc:creator: @skater12dude skater12dude
item.description:
@skater12dude wrote:

trying to add deathtouched darts, did exactly as the post says,
spawned them in game and they weren’t one hitting, went through eclipse and its saying theres an error in the coding

“player cannot be resolved”
“player cannot be resolved to a variable”

here’s the code if it matters. Idk I’m just a noob and I’ve never coded. just want to try these things out >.>

if (weaponName.contains(“deathtouched dart”)) {
if (target instanceof Player) {
Player p2 = (Player) target;
p2.stopAll();
} else {
NPC n = (NPC) target;
Player player;
World.sendProjectile(player, n, 3429, 41, 36, 50, 0, 15, 0);
n.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(3428));
n.setCapDamage(200000);
n.applyHit(new Hit(player, n.getHitpoints(), HitLook.CRITICAL_DAMAGE));
player.getAppearence().generateAppearenceData();
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: "player cannot be resolved" help with deathtouched darts
